name: Police Quest IV: Open Season
notes: The game uses ScummVM as the runner, the install script uses Dosbox to extract the files

write_file.content:
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR" -t dir
imgmount D "$CACHE/PQ4.gog" -t iso
ver set 6 22
D:
C:\xcopy.exe /E *.* C:\
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select Setup.exe
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- xcopy: https://github.com/appoloin/WfW/raw/master/XCOPY.EXE
game:
  game_id: sci
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $xcopy
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/manual.pdf
- write_file:
    content: '[autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR" -t dir

      imgmount D "$CACHE/PQ4.gog" -t iso

      ver set 6 22

      D:

      C:\xcopy.exe /E *.* C:\

      exit '
    file: $CACHE/pq4.conf
- task:
    config_file: $CACHE/pq4.conf
    name: dosbox.dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: -r $GAMEDIR/XCOPY.EXE
    file: /bin/rm
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
